channel.title: Running TFS 2008 (Beta 2) in Production
channel.description: Yesterday I sat down with my freshly downloaded Orcas Beta 2 media (thanks to the Secure Content Downloader from the good folks at Microsoft Research in Cambridge) and upgraded our production TFS instance.  The good news is that the set-up process in Beta...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Wes MacDonald+00:00
item.description: The WSS upgrade doesn't happen as part of the TFS upgrade, though I concur going to 2008 was smooth. I did an in-place upgrade of WSS to v3 after the upgrade to TFS 2008 and all is well.
item.dc:creator: Wes MacDonald
